mapper.insert: insert into reply values( seq_reply_idx.nextval, #{r_content}, sysdate, #{b_idx}, #{m_idx}, #{r_ip}, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT rv.*, rl.m_idx, CASE nvl(rl.m_idx,0) WHEN rl.m_idx THEN 1 ELSE 0 END rl_isliked FROM reply_view rv LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM REPLY_ISLIKED rl WHERE m_idx=#{m_idx}) rl ON rv.r_idx = rl.R_IDX WHERE b_idx=#{b_idx} order by rv.r_idx desc
mapper.delete: DELETE REPLY_ISLIKED WHERE r_idx=#{r_idx} and m_idx=#{m_idx}
mapper.update: update reply set r_like_count= (select count(*) from REPLY_ISLIKED where r_idx=#{r_idx})
mapper.delete: delete reply where r_idx=#{r_idx} and m_idx=#{m_idx}
mapper.select: select count(*) from reply where m_idx=#{m_idx} and r_idx=#{r_idx}
mapper.update: update reply set r_content=#{r_content}, r_date = sysdate where r_idx=#{r_idx}
